column1: Little Goat Diner////I've been dying to go here especially since I've been to The Girl and the Goat twice already. Their menu is awesome
column3: the food is awesome! Their cheesy hashbrowns are probably the best I've ever had. What I loved most about my first visit was the staff. They really go above and beyond for their customers
column4: more than your typical diner. Can't wait to come back!
